name: Noh-P.U.N.K. Ze Amin
effectText: You can pay 600 LP; add 1 "P.U.N.K." monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Noh-P.U.N.K. Ze Amin". If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "P.U.N.K." monster you control; it gains 600 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Noh-P.U.N.K. Ze Amin" once per turn.
